headline.print_headline: How the Dow Jones Industrial Average Did Thursday
headline.main: How the Dow Jones Industrial Average Did Thursday

docs.snippet: Major U.S. stock indexes finished mostly higher on Thursday, delivering another record-high close for the Standard & Poor's 500 index. It was the fifth straight gain for S&P 500 on a day when the market mostly drifted between small gains a...
docs.lead_paragraph: Major U.S. stock indexes finished mostly higher on Thursday, delivering another record-high close for the Standard & Poor's 500 index. It was the fifth straight gain for S&P 500 on a day when the market mostly drifted between small gains and losses before a slight recovery in the last half hour.

docs.snippet: Japan coach Alberto Zaccheroni has dropped out-of-form attacking midfielder Shinji Kagawa from his side for the World Cup Group C clash against Greece on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Japan coach Alberto Zaccheroni has dropped out-of-form attacking midfielder Shinji Kagawa from his side for the World Cup Group C clash against Greece on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Rooney's First Career World Cup Goal Not Enough
headline.main: Rooney's First Career World Cup Goal Not Enough

docs.snippet: One moment, Wayne Rooney madly celebrated the triumph of ending years of criticism for his World Cup struggles. Then, the England striker left the field with his head down in disappointment....

headline.print_headline: AP PHOTOS: Universal's New Harry Potter Park
headline.main: AP PHOTOS: Universal's New Harry Potter Park

docs.snippet: A new park, The Wizarding World of Harry Potter-Diagon Alley, is expected to open to the public at Universal Orlando Resort on July 8. It's the theme park's second attraction inspired by the Harry Potter series of books and movies. The first one o...
docs.lead_paragraph: A new park, The Wizarding World of Harry Potter-Diagon Alley, is expected to open to the public at Universal Orlando Resort on July 8. It's the theme park's second attraction inspired by the Harry Potter series of books and movies. The first one opened in 2010 and has been wildly popular with visitors.

headline.print_headline: Colorado Domestic Violence Victim Gets Payout Over Immigration Hold
headline.main: Colorado Domestic Violence Victim Gets Payout Over Immigration Hold

docs.snippet: A Colorado county has agreed to pay $30,000 to a female victim of domestic violence who was jailed for three days at the request of U.S. immigration authorities even after a judge ordered her released, a civil rights group said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Colorado county has agreed to pay $30,000 to a female victim of domestic violence who was jailed for three days at the request of U.S. immigration authorities even after a judge ordered her released, a civil rights group said on Thursday.

docs.snippet: Over the last decade, the commission has issued dozens of fines and citations against individuals and companies both for using jammers and for offering them for sale....

headline.main: Cybercriminals Zero In on a Lucrative New Target: Hedge Funds
